title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2G.04 - Preferential Lane Vehicle Occupancy Definition Regulatory Signs (R3-10 Series and R3-13 Series)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2G.04 - Preferential Lane Vehicle Occupancy Definition Regulatory Signs (R3-10 Series and R3-13 Series)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraphs 02 and 03. INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 01A The Inherently Low Emission Vehicle (ILEV) (R3-10a)
sign shall not be used in New York. The Clean Pass (NYR4-28) sign (see Sign

Drawing SD-R21) shall be used in its place, subject to the same guidance stated
for the R3-10a. Option: 12A The HOV Violations (NYR4-19) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-R21) may be used in conjunction with preferential lanes as deemed
necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2G.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
